alert.note: Alert for Jack (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 7:41PM CDT until May 06 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jack County in north central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles south of Windthorst, or 16 miles northwest of Jacksboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksboro, Bryson, Newport, Fort Richardson State Park, Cundiff, Jermyn, Lost Creek Reservoir, Antelope and Postoak. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
